sentence: U.S. stock index futures rose on Monday as more states looked set to lift coronavirus-induced curbs, and investors awaited earnings reports from marquee companies including Apple and Microsoft due this week.

.N

At 9:02 ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.97% at 23,888.
S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 1.00% at 2,857.75, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 1.21% at 8,875.
